solution_line_template: Since Dana Point beach has four times the number of sharks in Newport beach, there are {multiplier_dana}*{newport_sharks} = <<{multiplier_dana}*{newport_sharks}={dana_sharks}>>{dana_sharks} sharks at Dana Point.
In total, the two beaches have {dana_sharks}+{newport_sharks} = <<{dana_sharks}+{newport_sharks}={total_sharks}>>{total_sharks} sharks
